questions: A local variable is stored in ___
In the given statement, what does the “arr” indicate?  char *arr[30];
optionA: arr is a array of function
optionB: arr is a array of 30 characters
optionC: arr is a pointer to an array
optionD: arr is a array of 30 character pointers
answer: arr is a array of 30 character pointers
